title: 鹿学院春季大扫除活动
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Vast+Shadow&display=swap')
div#container-wrap{
background-image:none;
}
#header{
background:url("http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event/cherryicon.png");
background-repeat:no-repeat;
background-size:110px;
background-position:left;
}
div#extra-div-1{
height: 140px;
width: 100%;
top: 0;
position: absolute;
background: url("http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event/bannercherry.png");
background-size:cover;
background-position:20% 20%;
}
#login-status{
text-shadow:1px 1px 1px black;
}
#header h1 a {
color:pink;
text-shadow:2px 2px 1px purple, -2px 2px 1px black, -2px -2px 1px black, 2px -2px 1px black;
font-size:36px;
}
#header h2 span::before {
content: "春季扫除承诺";
color:pink;
text-shadow:2px 2px 1px purple, -2px 2px 1px black, -2px -2px 1px black, 2px -2px 1px black;
font-size:16px;
}
#header h2 span {
font-size:0;
}
#page-title{
color:pink;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px black, -1px 1px 1px black, -1px -1px 1px black, 1px -1px 1px black;
text-align:center;
}
.okaywork{
display:flex;
margin-top:-50px;
flex-direction:row;
}
.wayone{
flex:1 1 50%;
padding:10px;
}
.base{
font-family: 'Vast Shadow';
font-size: 400%;
margin: 2px 0 5px;
font-weight:bold;
text-shadow:0px 0px 2px black;
}
.base p{
line-height:1;
margin-block-start:0em;
margin-block-end:0em;
}
.pink{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,245,250,1) 50%);
}
.green{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(224,246,235,1) 50%);
}
.cobweb{
color:#98FB98;
}
.junk{
color:#ffb7c5;
}
.greenery{
border:solid 1px #999999;
background:#f5fffa;
padding:5px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
margin-top:60px;
}
.redery{
border:solid 1px #999999;
background:#fff5fa;
padding:5px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
margin-top:60px;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen{
display:none;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssred{
display:none;
}
@media only screen and (max-width:600px){
.wayone{
display:none;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(224,246,235,1) 50%);
padding:10px;
display:block;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssred{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,245,250,1) 50%);
padding:10px;
display:block;
}
[[/module]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event/flowers.png style="width:100%;box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16) 0px 1px 4px, rgb(51, 51, 51) 0px 0px 0px 3px;"]]
= [[size 80%]]**由 Discord 评稿职员举办！**[[/size]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
大家好，鹿学院的居民们、潜水人们、评稿员们还有作者们！

现在春天来了，那就意味着是时候开始好好地来一场传统的春季大扫除了！

对于 SCP 维基来说，我们会邀请所有人来清扫蜘蛛网，或者修理好那些破烂。你可以以两种方式的之一参与这次活动：
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div style="display:flex;margin-top:30px;"]]
[[div class="wayone green"]]
[[div class="base cobweb"]]
方式 1：
蜘蛛网
[[/div]]
你有在吃灰的东西吗？可能是落在柜台后方的一份草稿？或者说是碰都还没碰的一份艺作？

选择一个你一直想抽出时间来搞的吃灰 1 年以上的项目。如果你有很多个项目的话，可以试试把这些项目友情赠送给可能自己没有项目的人。

你可以选择完全做一个甩手掌柜，或者是把它拾起来作为合作项目。

在写作阶段中，把那份项目做得达到能够发布的质量。

发布！（不发也行，你自己选。我们又不是你爸妈！）

是什么让你想要选择这份作品作为自己的写作项目，在一段时间之后你重新看一遍这个概念又是怎样开始写的，等等。将这一切都跟你鹿学院的在春季大扫除伙伴一起讨论吧。
[[/div]]
[[div class="wayone pink"]]
[[div class="base junk"]]
方式 2：
破烂
[[/div]]
有时候，我们会有些放了很多年月的东西。那为什么不给它检查检查，然后修好它呢？

选出你一直想修一修的一篇已发布作品，然后把它写得更好点吧。

在写作阶段中，你可以把作品复制到沙盒里，然后给它修一修。

发布它！（或者更新。或者啥也不做！重申一遍，我们又不是你的父母。）

为什么你觉得这篇作品需要被重写，你这么干有什么哲学理论，还有你最初是喜欢它什么才会迫使你写它呢。将这一切都跟你鹿学院的在春季大扫除伙伴一起讨论吧。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen"]]
[[div class="base cobweb"]]
方式 1：
蜘蛛网
[[/div]]
你有在吃灰的东西吗？可能是落在柜台后方的一份草稿？或者说是碰都还没碰的一份艺作？

选择一个你一直想抽出时间来搞的吃灰 1 年以上的项目。如果你有很多个项目的话，可以试试把这些项目友情赠送给可能自己没有项目的人。

你可以选择完全做一个甩手掌柜，或者是把它拾起来作为合作项目。

在写作阶段中，把那份项目做得达到能够发布的质量。

发布！（不发也行，你自己选。我们又不是你爸妈！）

是什么让你想要选择这份作品作为自己的写作项目，在一段时间之后你重新看一遍这个概念又是怎样开始写的，等等。将这一切都跟你鹿学院的在春季大扫除伙伴一起讨论吧。
[[/div]]
[[div class="magicbecauseiambadatcssred"]]
[[div class="base junk"]]
方式 2：
破烂
[[/div]]
有时候，我们会有些放了很多年月的东西。那为什么不给它检查检查，然后修好它呢？

选出你一直想修一修的一篇已发布作品，然后把它写得更好点吧。

在写作阶段中，你可以把作品复制到沙盒里，然后给它修一修。

发布它！（或者更新。或者啥也不做！重申一遍，我们又不是你的父母。）

为什么你觉得这篇作品需要被重写，你这么干有什么哲学理论，还有你最初是喜欢它什么才会迫使你写它呢。将这一切都跟你鹿学院的在春季大扫除伙伴一起讨论吧。
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
-----

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **日期**
[[/=]]
-----
**写作阶段：**本页面发布起！

**发布阶段开始：**美东时间 3 月 26 日凌晨 12:01

**发布阶段结束：**--美东时间 4 月 19 日凌晨 12:01-- 延期至美东时间 5 月 1 日凌晨 12:01

**评分阶段：**--美东时间 4 月 19 日凌晨 12:02 -- 美东时间 4 月 26 日凌晨 12:01-- 美东时间 5 月 1 日凌晨 12:02 — 美东时间 5 月 8 日凌晨 12:01

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **承诺**
[[/=]]
-----
这不是一场竞赛，而且也没有奖品，但是我们有留认领成就的空间！来拿徽章：
* 草稿考古者
* 论坛勇士
* 最新鲜涂画
* 票上月球
* 少说话就能做事为什么要多说？
* 贪婪评文人
* 炼狱先生的批准标记
* 最佳合著拍档
* ……还有更多！
[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **目标**
[[/=]]
-----
我们这里的目标就是让每一个人都能去重新看看自己的旧稿子，然后把它尽自己可能去做到最好。这是你展现自己经验（或者给过去的自己盖帽）的机会。请记住这不是一次比赛，而是对我们所有人而言的集体练习！

别有压力！
[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **规则**
[[/=]]
-----
# 遵守[[[site-rules|站点规则]]]。没有例外。
# 遵守[[[criticism-policy|批评政策]]]。
# 遵守 [https://discord.com/channels/877710488673329162/877718729465671760/1063297988430147664 Discord 服务器规则]。
#  This is a Discord Critique Team event so if you would like to participate please join the Official SCP Discord Server (https://discord.gg/scp) and join us in the Deer College writing channels.
# 你只能在每一类目中投稿__一__篇草稿/文章。合著也算在其内。
# 你可以在发布阶段以及投票阶段开始之间的任意时间段将作品发布至维基中以参加本活动。
# 你在发布阶段结束之后仍可发布文章，但你的文章将不会被算作本次活动赛程的一部分，且不会被考虑在徽章中。
# 我们鼓励但不强制你去评论其他人改稿的努力。我们将在 Discord 的写作频道论坛使用竞赛标签来追踪每一次的评论。
# 我们鼓励你强调出那些能留下富有洞察力的评论的人，或者是能够留下改进你作品的不错建议的人。
# 如果你接受了友情赠送来的点子，那么你需要指出是从谁那里拿到的这点子，以及注明你有没有在自己的最终草稿里用到那人的作品。这是否构成合著由你们双方共同决定。
# 如果你与某人合著了一篇文章，请确信你有请求一名职员将你和你的合著者放到归属资料里！
# All draft donations and claims must be put in this sandbox: https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/collab:spring-cleaning. Follow the rules there as well!
# 玩得开心！
[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **参赛条目**
[[=]]
++++ ##GREEN|**蜘蛛网**##
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-corey | Critter Profile: Corey!]]] by [[*user Queerious]] (draft donated by [[*user Fish^12]])
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8359 | SCP-8359: 3AM]]] by [[*user CompleteIndie]] (draft donated by [[*user JakdragonX]])

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8055 |SCP-8055: I had a bad dream]]] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]

[[[SCP-7673| SCP-7673: Luluwa]]] by [[*user IvanNavi]]
[[[dead-man-walking | Dead Man Walking]]] by [[*user Anorrack]]

[[[SCP-8286| SCP-8286: The Lost Mother]]] by [[*user Sushimi]] (draft donated by [[*user PeppersGhost]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/who-s-afraid-of-ulrike-meinhof | Who's Afraid of Ulrike Meinhof]]] by [[*user Nonaggress]]
[[[SCP-6527| SCP-6527: Anyway,]]] by [[*user fairydoctor]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/digital-daemon-revival | nightfall++: Digital Demon Revival]]] by [[*user JackalRelated]]
[[/=]]

++++ ##RED|**破烂**##
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-dagons-curriculum-vitae|Pedagon's refurbished author page!]]] by [[*user pedagon]]
[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-8499 SCP-8499: 荒芜与破败的回响] by [[*user Miss Lapis]] and [[*user Strange Matter]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7761 SCP-7761: Elena Rustfeld's Last Stand] by [[*user MaddGasserGaton]] and [[*user Nonaggress]]
[[[SCP-8901|SCP-8901: Colours of Magic]]] by [[*user Ethagon]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
-----

-----
[[=]]
++++ **颁奖**
[[/=]]
-----

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **草稿考古学家**
Who brought the oldest drafts to work with?

++ **草稿考古学家金牌**
The absolute oldest found in the ground
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/draftarchaeologist-oldest-export.png style="width:50%;"]]

[[*user PeppersGhost]] with a draft from 2012!

++ **草稿考古学家银牌**
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/draftarchaeologist-oldest2.png style="width:50%;"]]
More than 5 years old drafts dug up and available for adoption!
[[*user syuzhet]] with a draft from 2014
[[*user Doctor Cimmerian]] with a draft from 2016
[[*user Crow-cat]] with a draft from 2018
[[*user Ihp]] with a draft from somewhere before 2018

++ **草稿考古学家铜牌**
[[image  https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/draftarchaeologist-oldest3.png style="width:50%;"]]
More than 3 years old drafts dug up and available for adoption!
[[*user Dysadron]] with a draft from 2019 & 2021
[[*user tsercele]] with a draft from 2019
[[*user Dr Asteria]] with a draft from 2021
[[*user JackalRelated]] with a draft from 2021
[[*user Ethagon]] with a draft from 2021
[[*user Queerious]] with a draft from 2021
[[*user JakdragonX]] with a draft from 2021
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

-----

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **论坛武士**
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/forumwarrior.png style="width:50%;"]]
Time to acknowledge those who vote and comment!
[[*user Djoric]] with the most comments
And those with the most up or downvotes:
[[*user stealth000]] & [[*user cicada3301fan]] & [[*user Space Diamond]]
[[*user ivannavi]] & [[*user ethagon]] & [[*user Uncle Nicolini ]]
[[*user DrApricus]] & [[*user Miss Lapis]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **最具创意的图画**
Who went ham with the visuals?
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/freshestpaint.png style="width:50%;"]]
Which ones were looking the tightest in that fresh coat of paint?

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8299 SCP-8299: TRUE NORTH STRONG AND FREE] by [[*user Stealth000]] & [[*user Lt Flops]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-corey Critter Profile: Corey!] by [[*user Queerious]] & [[*user Fish^12]]

[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **为何多说少做？**
Drafts with less than 1k words

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **早起的鸟儿**
First Poster

The first to post:
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-corey Critter Profile: Corey!] by [[*user Queerious]]
The first by technicality:

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **我们的合作是最棒的**
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/collabest.png style="width:50%;"]]
[[*user Lt Flops]] & [[*user Stealth000]]
[[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[*user Fish^12]] & [[*user Queerious]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **MRPURGATORIO的认可标志**
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/mrpurgatorio.png style="width:50%;"]]
Fly's husband has a very picky taste, so this might've been one of the hardest badges to grab! Here are his favourites:

Just [[*user Pedagon]] in general! And also for organising Spring Cleaning and being awesome!!
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-dagons-curriculum-vitae Pedagon's refurbished author page!]  by [[*user Pedagon]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8901 SCP-8901: Colours of Magic] by [[*user Ethagon]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8055 SCP-8055: I had a bad dream] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/just-another-day Just Another Day] by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]

And his absolute favourite: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/digital-daemon-revival nightfall++: Digital Demon Revival] by [[*user JackalRelated]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **投向月球**
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:spring-cleaning-badges/tothemoon.png style="width:50%;"]]
Voted to get the most recognition, and read during the stream!

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8055 SCP-8055 I had a bad dream] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]

With honourable mentions to:
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8097 SCP-8097: Ƿ is for the Ƿaylaid Ƿallflower] by [[*user Ihp]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8499 SCP-8499: Echoes of the Barren and Broken] by [[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **黄金Jackal的GLOCK-19**[[footnote]]This badge is in good humour and made with Jackal's approval.[[/footnote]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/d9GhSpz.png style="width:50%;"]]
The typo in Glock-19 is intentional.

This badge is for all participants who posted before [[*user JackalRelated]] did! You won the secret race!

Congratz on beating our favourite point of mockery to:
[[*user Queerious]] & [[*user CompleteIndie]] & [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
[[*user PeppersGhost]] & [[*user PoufyPoufson]] & [[*user Tsercele]]
[[*user Ihp]] & [[*user Dr Kira Moto]] & [[*user IvanNavi]]
[[*user Anorrack]] & [[*user Stealth000]] & [[*user Sushimi]]
[[*user Nonaggress]] & [[*user fairydoctor]] & [[*user pedagon]]
[[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[*user MaddGasserGaton]] & [[*user Ethagon]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]

特别感谢[[*user Fish^12]]制作了这些徽章！[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/art:spring-cleaning-badges 读下他的创作思路以及在这里为艺作up！]

Thanks to [[*user AstersQuill]], [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[*user Fish^12]] for organising Spring Cleaning, [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[*user Prismal]] for helping behind the scenes to set up the event stream, and to [[*user psychicProgrammer]] and [[*user Corax D]] for joining Fishy and me to host and read the Public Fav! And [[*user UncertaintyCrossing]] for editing of course.

And all love to [[*user Pedagon]]!! All Hail Dinoman.

++ **You can listen to the event [https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/scp-wiki-archives/episodes/Spring-Cleaning-Event-Seminar-e2k1se4 here]!**

~Fly

[[module CSS]]
/* Do not modify, unless u know what are u doing */
.snowflake {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  text-shadow: 0 0 5px #000;
}

@-webkit-keyframes snowflakes-fall{0%{top:-10%}100%{top:100%}}@-webkit-keyframes snowflakes-shake{0%,100%{-webkit-transform:translateX(0);transform:translateX(0)}50%{-webkit-transform:translateX(80px);transform:translateX(80px)}}@keyframes snowflakes-fall{0%{top:-10%}100%{top:100%}}@keyframes snowflakes-shake{0%,100%{transform:translateX(0)}50%{transform:translateX(80px)}}.snowflake{position:fixed;top:-10%;z-index:9999;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;cursor:default;-webkit-animation-name:snowflakes-fall,snowflakes-shake;-webkit-animation-duration:10s,3s;-webkit-animation-timing-function:linear,ease-in-out;-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite,infinite;-webkit-animation-play-state:running,running;animation-name:snowflakes-fall,snowflakes-shake;animation-duration:10s,3s;animation-timing-function:linear,ease-in-out;animation-iteration-count:infinite,infinite;animation-play-state:running,running}.snowflake:nth-of-type(0){left:1%;-webkit-animation-delay:20s,20s;animation-delay:20s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(1){left:10%;-webkit-animation-delay:21s,21s;animation-delay:21s,21s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(2){left:20%;-webkit-animation-delay:26s,25s;animation-delay:26s,25s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(3){left:30%;-webkit-animation-delay:24s,22s;animation-delay:24s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(4){left:40%;-webkit-animation-delay:22s,22s;animation-delay:22s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(5){left:50%;-webkit-animation-delay:28s,23s;animation-delay:28s,23s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(6){left:60%;-webkit-animation-delay:26s,22s;animation-delay:26s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(7){left:70%;-webkit-animation-delay:22.5s,21s;animation-delay:22.5s,21s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(8){left:80%;-webkit-animation-delay:21s,20s;animation-delay:21s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(9){left:90%;-webkit-animation-delay:23s,21.5s;animation-delay:23s,21.5s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(10){left:25%;-webkit-animation-delay:22s,20s;animation-delay:22s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(11){left:65%;-webkit-animation-delay:24s,22.5s;animation-delay:24s,22.5s}
[[/module]]
